DOC.brief_title: A Placebo-Controlled Single-Dose Trial Sildenafil Schizophrenia
DOC.detailed_description: Specific Aims : 1 . Evaluate effect single dos sildenafil 50 & 100 mg compare placebo cognitive functioning , include verbal memory , fluency , attention , spatial memory , motor speed , executive function . 2 . Evaluate effect single dos sildenafil 50 & 100 mg compare placebo psychotic , negative , mood symptom . 3 . Assess self-reports side effect sildenafil 50 & 100 mg . Location Subjects : 25 adult outpatient schizophrenia recruit Massachusetts General Hospital outpatient clinic Freedom Trail Clinic Lindemann Center . All research procedure perform Psychopharmacology Clinic Massachusetts General Hospital . Subjects must English speak cognitive battery validate English .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Diagnosis schizophrenia , subtype . 2 . Age 1865 year 3 . Male female 4 . Clinically stable without medication change within 4 week 5 . Able complete cognitive testing ( must Englishspeaking ) 6 . Willing use appropriate birth control study participation ( female ) 1 . Active substance abuse dependence 2 . PDE 5 inhibitor take within 24 hour study drug 3 . Currently take drug inhibits hepatic cytochrome P450 3A4 ( eg . Nefazadone , fluvoxamine , erythromycin , ketoconazole , itraconazole , cimetidine , saquinavir , ritonavir , St. John 's wort , grapefruit juice ) . 4 . Peptic ulcer disease 9 . Hepatic impairment 10 . Moderate great renal impairment 11 . History migraines 12 . Currently take nitrate alpha blocker 13 .
